landing.bio: With a Bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering, I began coding more than ten years ago, first involving micro-controllers and electronics software, then as a hobby and finally, I decided to make it my primarily profession two years ago. Since then I’m focused on improving  my skills  and finding  interesting projects  and people  to work with.

experience.aboutWork: Part of the developer’s team, working remotely since beginning of August. The company provides technological solutions for the last mile for e-commerce’s stores

tasks.task: Migration of the main apps from Heroku to AWS, obtaining benefits up to 100% in response time and improving scalability.
Integration with external API’s mainly related to e-commerce, such as Tiendanube, Shopify, WooComerce.
To solve internal / external issues through JIRA’s ticketing system.

experience.aboutWork: Part-time flexible job and working remotely from beginning of August.

tasks.task: To instruct students in several introductory IT related courses, such as: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Python, Arduino, Git.

education.institute: National University of Mar del Plata
education.extra: Thesis: “Android App to Control A Domotic Home System”. Technologies: JAVA(Android), Objective C(Arduino), Google Voice's API, Bluetooth.
Intensive 10 weeks Bootcamp covering: Javascript, Bootstrap, API’s (Google Maps, Google Voice, Facebook, Tumblr), Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Rspec, Sidekiq, Redis, Github, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Heroku.
Courses for Back-end (PHP, MySQL) and Front-end (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap).

projects.technologies: Ruby on Rails - Hosted in Heroku

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

awards.awardDetail: Started North India's First Student Design and Developer Conference.
